ViolationList.ViolationName: Prefer using environment file instead of using java.lang.System.getenv()
Ensure you don't use 'java.System.exit()' to know what happened when you exit your program
Ensure not using Fields (non static final) from other Classes to respect OO encapsulation concepts
Prefer not using anonymous Classes for maintenance reason
Ensure that the boolean are not instantiated
Ensure to throw an exception which has been declared
Prefer using logging framework  as SLF4j instead of  'System.err' or 'System.out'
Ensure to have other ways of listing errors outside a try/catch  than 'System.err' and 'System.out'
Ensure to use StringBuffer and StringBuffer.append() method instead
Avoid method invocation in a loop termination expression
